name: NightRush
description:
You play as a vampire who is on a hurry to arrive to his crypt before sunrise reaches him.

Use your bat form to cross the city while avoiding obstacles and other living nuissances. Enter buildings to quench bloodthirst and restore energy.

Made for the Murcia Game Jam 2018.

How to play

Left arrow : move to the left

Right arrow : move to the right

Spacebar: flap

Up/Down arrow: enter from the window
